### Event History

#### Fall 2024

<strong>Inaugural BORI Event</strong>

- Homemade Coquito, Sandwiches de Mezclita, Sorullitos
- Introduce everyone to the club and its purpose/vision

<strong>Trivia Night with Snacks</strong>

- Hacer PR trivia questions, snacks

---

#### Spring 2025

<strong>Winter Org Fair: Enero 30 @11am-1pm</strong>

- Poster, Banderitas, Bocina, Hershey Kisses

<strong>BORI Kickoff: Febrero 6 @5pm</strong>

- Coquito, Sandwiches de Mezclita, Sorullitos

<strong>Festival de Chocolate: Febrero 21</strong>

- Fresas con chocolate, tierrita, start/stop running game, papa caliente, The Standard rooftop area

<strong>March Gladness: Marzo 6</strong>

- Tabling event con juego tipico de PR (jacks)

<strong>BORI Game Night: Marzo 13</strong>

- Jueguitos tradicionales de PR y juegos PR themed y snacks

---

#### Fall 2025

<strong>Freshman Kickoff: Agosto 12 @ 1:15pm (Skiles 169)</strong>

- Bienvenidos a GT/Atlanta, serve as resources for new students from PR
- Krispy Kreme donas

<strong>Fall Org Fair: Agosto 27 @11-1pm (Tech Green)</strong>

- Poster, Banderitas, Bocina, Hershey Kisses

<strong>BORI KickOff: Septiembre 3 @5:30pm (Boggs 103)</strong>

- Galletas publix, snacks tipicos, dulcecitos

<strong>BORI Professional Panel: Septiembre 24 @5pm (IC)</strong>

- Regalo para participantes, Preguntas ready

<strong>Dominos Tournament: Octubre @11-1pm at Kendeda</strong>

- Funding requested for $200, Dominoes, Papi's Cuban cater empanadas, Prizes

<strong>Vamo a Jugal': Octubre 10 @4pm (Piedmont Park)</strong>

- Limber Parcha y Cherry y Coco, Bolas Soccer, Volley, Football, Bocina #active

<strong>Movie Night: Noviembre 13 @7pm (The Connector 7th floor big screen)</strong>

- Reserve the big screen at the Connect, Pelicula puertorriquena, popcorn, snacks

<strong>Taller Coquito: Noviembre ____ @7pm (TBD. apt)</strong>

- Leche evaporada, leche condensada, crema de coco, canela molida, vainilla, botellas de cristal para que la gente se lleve el coquito que han hecho

<div style="margin-top: 20px;">

I've always had a passion for cooking, especially exploring different cuisines and experimenting with traditional recipes. From mastering Puerto Rican classics to trying new international dishes, the kitchen is my creative space.

**Favorite dishes to make:**
- Traditional Puerto Rican cuisine (arroz con gandules, pernil, pasteles)
- Homemade pasta and Italian dishes
- Experimental fusion recipes
